metadata.name: Copy .DMP/.DUMP Files From Remote Share Via Cmd.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the copy builtin cmd command to copy files with the ".dmp"/".dump" extension from a remote share

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \\\\')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dump')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.hdmp'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of the copy builtin cmd command to copy files with the ".dmp"/".dump" extension from a remote share
